trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000010_WUKLAMAT<tab>What is she doing here?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000020_WUKLAMAT<tab>We just heard she was busy spreading talk of becoming Endless among the Alexandrians. What's going on here?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000030_YSHTOLA<tab>She...is not who you think she is.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000040_YSHTOLA<tab>Not the Queen of Reason who has made a miraculous return, but an individual of flesh and blood, possessed of a soul.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000050_YSHTOLA<tab>We chanced upon her in Living Memory, but she collapsed before we could exchange words. We decided to bring her here for now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000060_ALISAIE<tab>Her body was suffused with lightning aether, which caused a debilitating paralysis.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000070_ALISAIE<tab>Y'shtola reached out and informed me of her condition, and I came with a porxie as fast as I could. We're now waiting to see if the treatment was effective.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000080_YSHTOLA<tab>Judging by her appearance, the circumstances of our encounter, and her extreme aetherial aspect...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000090_YSHTOLA<tab>...I am all but certain that she is the one from whom the Endless Sphene was created─the original Queen Sphene of Alexandria.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000100_WUKLAMAT<tab>What!? But how can that be possible?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000110_WUKLAMAT<tab>The real Sphene died of illness four centuries ago!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000120_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>(-Familiar-looking Woman-)I...I died...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000130_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>(-Familiar-looking Woman-)Whatever...do you mean?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000140_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>(-Familiar-looking Woman-)I...I am <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> dead! I'm not!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000150_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>(-Familiar-looking Woman-)What...what is this place?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000160_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>(-Familiar-looking Woman-)Where is everyone? Otis...and Zelenia...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000170_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>(-Familiar-looking Woman-)And who are you people!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000180_ALISAIE<tab>Calm down─we mean you no harm. You've been unwell, and it wouldn't do to strain yourself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000190_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>(-Familiar-looking Woman-)Please...help me. I don't understand...any of this...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000200_YSHTOLA<tab>Of course. But if I might confirm some things first... You are Queen Sphene of Alexandria, are you not?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000210_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Yes... Yes, I am.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000220_YSHTOLA<tab>And ere you awoke here, you were in another unfamiliar place. Is that correct?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000230_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I opened my eyes...and saw a strange, dark room. Outside, there were towering buildings...clad in electrope...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000240_YSHTOLA<tab>You slumbered at the heart of that city for many years, within a facility called the Meso Terminal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>Many things have come to pass during that time...some of which you may find upsetting. Are you sure you wish to learn of them?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000260_SHALE<tab>In that dark room, there was an electrope casket designed to preserve its occupant in cold stasis.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000270_SHALE<tab>Until the terminal and its systems were recently shut down, that was where you were kept, in all likelihood.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000280_SHALE<tab>Since the time of the old kingdom, for four centuries...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000290_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>What...? Do you...speak true?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000300_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I've been asleep for that long...? Four hundred years?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000310_SHALE<tab>Our records say that Queen Sphene succumbed to the rampant lightning energies unleashed during the Storm Surge. But it seems the truth is rather different.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000320_WUKLAMAT<tab>I know this has all been a lot to take in, but how are you feeling? Physically, I mean.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000330_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Much better now, thanks to Y'shtola and Alisaie's ministrations. In fact, I can scarcely remember the last time I felt so hale.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000340_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I know not how to repay them... Not only for coming to my aid, but for telling me about my kingdom besides...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000350_WUKLAMAT<tab>I don't think they're ones to keep score. Isn't that right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Y'shtola is the motherly sort.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Alisaie never abandons those in need.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>They're comrades you can rely on!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000360_WUKLAMAT<tab><var 08 E905 ((She's)) ((He's)) /var> known those two for a long time. You can trust in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> judgment.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000370_WUKLAMAT<tab>Besides, you helped to prove that their treatment works here as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000380_WUKLAMAT<tab>With this success, they'll be able to help others in Alexandria who suffer from the same illness. Few things could make them happier.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000390_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I see... Full glad am I to know that we may cure the affliction after so long.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000400_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>So very long...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000410_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I steeled myself, having been warned, but it's...difficult to come to terms with everything...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000420_GULOOLJA<tab>Sphene...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000430_GULOOLJA<tab>Maybe going out and seeing it would help. Alexandria, as it is now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000440_WUKLAMAT<tab>Great idea! There's no substitute for seeing things with your own eyes.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000450_WUKLAMAT<tab>That said, there is a chance that you'll run into the other Sphene...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000460_WUKLAMAT<tab>Still want to take a look even so?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000470_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>It would be a lie to say I do not feel anxious. But...I wish to walk among the people. To hear their voices and learn about their realm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>We can go together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We'll be your escort!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000480_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Truly? I would be honored.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000490_WUKLAMAT<tab>Then allow us to show you the sights!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000500_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Thank you, Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000510_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Apologies for keeping you waiting. I've never worn such clothing before...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000520_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oho! That really suits you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Agreed!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's like you're a different person.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A3_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>It looks ideal for a brisk afternoon stroll.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000530_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I'm glad to hear that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000540_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I had much the same impression─I had only ever worn skirts, you see. But it seems appropriate for a new beginning...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000550_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>For one so well traveled to say that, I feel confident it's perfect for exploring the city.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000560_SHALE<tab>A moment before you head out.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000570_SHALE<tab>Circumstances being what they are, we thought it best to come up with a way to distinguish you from the other Sphenes. And we should probably settle on this now rather than later.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000580_GULOOLJA<tab>I suppose it could get pretty confusing...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000590_SHALE<tab>First, we propose calling you simply “Sphene.” As for the former Queen of Reason, “Endless Sphene” should suffice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000600_WUKLAMAT<tab>What about the new one who's been addressing the citizens?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000610_SHALE<tab>Despite being the spitting image of Endless Sphene, we know she's a different entity. So we were thinking of calling her a “simulant,” after imitation stones.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000620_WUKLAMAT<tab>I see... Well, they're definitely not the same, and that's as good a way as any to draw a distinction.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000630_WUKLAMAT<tab>But what do you think, Sphene? Is that alright with you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000640_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Rest assured I have no objections. When I am in the city, however, I intend to keep both my face and name secret.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000650_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>For the people of today's Alexandria know only the Endless Sphene...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000660_SHALE<tab>We're sorry to subject you to such ignominy...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000670_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>No, no. I myself would rather not invite complications, so it is quite alright. Thank you for your concern, Shale.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000680_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Let us be off, then. I am in your capable hands.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000690_WUKLAMAT<tab>That you are. First, we'll head to the entrance of Solution Nine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000700_GULOOLJA<tab>Good idea. We should start from scanning port nine. I'll do my best to explain things!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000710_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>So many different drinks. I can't decide...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000720_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Oh!ALT 1: Ah!ALT 2: [GASP]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000730_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I'll have this, please. A Dali coffee.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000740_DELIA<tab>Of course. I should warn you, though─Dali beans are an older variety known for their strong bitterness. Still want one?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000750_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>The bitterness is the best part.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000760_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Have you decided as well?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll have the same.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Something healthy. Vegetable juice, maybe...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sweet cocoa with extra cream on top!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000770_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Two Dali coffees, then. The beans make for dark roasts that are quite aromatic. I find the sharp flavor invigorating, though a dash of milk can be a wonderful complement.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000780_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Vegetable juice... Otis used to drink it all the time...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000790_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Ah, I understand completely. The allure of something sweet can often be too strong to resist.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000800_DELIA<tab>I'll have your drinks ready in a moment!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000810_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>They're certainly well-liked. It's a wonderful feeling, spending time with the people...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000820_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>[SIGH]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000830_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>But they're not my people anymore, are they? Their city, their way of life...even the ground upon which they tread... I am a stranger to it all...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000840_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>The weight of the long years is finally beginning to sink in...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000850_RESIDENTBOY05300<tab>Your Majesty? Is that you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000860_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I... Um... Well...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000870_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I'm sorry to disappoint, but I am not Queen Sphene...though I'm often told we look alike.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000880_RESIDENTMAN05300<tab>There you are! How many times have I told you not to go off alone!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000890_RESIDENTMAN05300<tab>I'm sorry he bothered you, ma'am. Come now, we're going home!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000900_RESIDENTBOY05300<tab>Bye, not-Queen Sphene!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000910_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I do not know that boy, nor does he know me. No one does.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000920_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Another harsh reminder that I have no place here...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000930_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Yet no matter how much things have changed, I am happy. I am. For Alexandria has endured. Our sacrifice was not in vain.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000940_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Even so, I cannot help but feel lonely...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000950_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Not here... Let's press on, if only a little further.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000960_WUKLAMAT<tab>Huh?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000970_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hey! Are you alright!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000980_CALYX<tab>(-???-)So <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> didn't die. Vexing, but expected.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_000990_NEWSPHENE<tab>That was about the strongest bolt we can produce within Everkeep. What now?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001000_CALYX<tab>(-???-)We obtain more precise measurements. Narrow the range of variables to avoid unnecessary trial and error. That is the most expeditious course of action.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001010_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I know that voice...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001020_NEWSPHENE<tab>You there! Yes, you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001030_NEWSPHENE<tab>We have important business with you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001040_NEWSPHENE<tab>We left something in your keeping─the key to interdimensional fusion. You will kindly return it to us, yes?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not on your life!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You ask me that after you try to kill me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001050_NEWSPHENE<tab>Is that so? What a shame.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001060_NEWSPHENE<tab>Now that you mention it, the other way around may have been more appropriate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001070_NEWSPHENE<tab>If I had the key, I wouldn't need to be cruel and turn away so many people. Far more than five thousand could become Endless and know eternal happiness.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001080_WUKLAMAT<tab>What!? You mean to steal aether from other worlds again!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001090_NEWSPHENE<tab>All is for the sake of his experiments.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001100_NEWSPHENE<tab>'Twas for that reason, you know, that the previous me created the Endless.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001110_NEWSPHENE<tab>I pity her. She was forced to attempt the impossible─to turn every soul who dies into an Endless even though there's no <var 1A 02 /var>end<var 1A 01 /var> to them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001120_NEWSPHENE<tab>Admittedly, that was part of the plan. Her desperation would drive her to claim the key and use it, and sure enough, she did just that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001130_NEWSPHENE<tab>I know you had a soft spot for her, Lamaty'i.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001135_NEWSPHENE<tab>So for what it's worth, I'm <var 1A 02 /var>truly<var 1A 01 /var> sorry.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001140_NEWSPHENE<tab>Alas, we are naught more than pawns. Pieces in his grand design.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001150_WUKLAMAT<tab>Don't you dare make light of her love for her people! Don't you dare!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001160_NEWSPHENE<tab>Strike me down if you wish. I shall be made anew.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001170_NEWSPHENE<tab>And I doubt many would look kindly upon the Vow of Resolve of Tuliyollal if she attacked a neighboring queen─and not for the first time. Would you be willing to accept the repercussions?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001180_WUKLAMAT<tab>Damn you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What is the objective of these experiments?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What do you stand to gain by making everyone Endless?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001190_CALYX<tab>(-???-)You're speaking to me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001200_CALYX<tab>(-???-)[EXASPERATED SIGH]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001210_CALYX<tab>(-???-)Our goal is to usher in the next phase of mankind's evolution.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001220_CALYX<tab>(-???-)Since time immemorial, life has used death to facilitate adaptation in an ever-changing environment.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001230_CALYX<tab>(-???-)The old and infirm are weeded out, allowing the species to thrive. Generational succession─this has been our survival strategy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001240_CALYX<tab>(-???-)Yet this strategy has long since reached its practical limit. It is outdated.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001250_CALYX<tab>(-???-)It relies on progeny, which gives rise to unchecked population growth. Resources become scarce, invariably leading to conflict.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001260_CALYX<tab>(-???-)All the while, death is ever present and robs our species of untold potential.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001270_CALYX<tab>(-???-)Where man now stands in his evolution, bodies of flesh no longer make sense. What we must strive for next is carefully managed, eternal preservation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001280_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>[GASP OF RECOGNITION]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001290_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Calyx... You're Calyx, aren't you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001300_WUKLAMAT<tab>You know him?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001310_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>The young genius who had mastered electrope technology...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001320_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>He founded the scientific collective known as Preservation, and devoted himself to developing a cure for the paralysis which plagued our people.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001330_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Calyx! You always had your gaze set upon the future, and I know you do now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001340_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>But I beg you, do not deceive the people of Alexandria! Do not manipulate them with this imitation forged from my memories!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001350_NEWSPHENE<tab>Well, how rude. Yet whatever you may say, I'm the one whom the people regard as queen.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001360_NEWSPHENE<tab>You may have worn the crown for a few years, but now you are no one. Just a frail, fleshy version of me that could die at any moment. The kingdom has no use for such as you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001370_CALYX<tab>Our demand is simple: surrender the key. Refusal will necessitate consequences.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001380_KRILE<tab>We've heard what happened. So, Preservation has revealed itself at last.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001390_GRAHATIA<tab>And using the key, they mean to turn even more people into Endless...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001400_GRAHATIA<tab>It seems safe to assume that they, too, intend to steal aether from the other reflections.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001410_GRAHATIA<tab>But unlike the previous Sphene, they have no intention of saving everyone.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001420_GRAHATIA<tab>Calyx of all people would know precisely how much aether is required to sustain an Endless. Thus he is able to set a realistic limit to their creation, without being swayed by emotion.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001430_KRILE<tab>Carefully managed, eternal preservation... Whether or not this can be considered an evolution, 'tis plain that man's very existence would be forever changed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001440_WUKLAMAT<tab>Say... If this Calyx is as brilliant a scientist as everyone says, could he have been the one who erased everyone's memories of Endless Sphene's death?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001450_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>That is a possibility, though I cannot speak to his motives...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001460_KRILE<tab>Though Calyx has outright stated his ultimate goal, how his actions will further this agenda remains unclear...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001470_KRILE<tab>That said, we have seen how anxiety towards death continues to spread amongst Alexandrians. Perhaps the simulant stokes this fear to entice them to become Endless.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001480_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Everyone is afraid of death. We try to put it out of our minds, and I do not blame the people for feeling as they do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001490_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Nonetheless, I wish to stop the simulant. I wish to do what I can for those who believe in their queen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001500_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Although I wear no crown, were I to forsake the people...then I would truly have no place here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001510_SHALE<tab>I don't know if this will help in that endeavor, but I've found something interesting.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001520_SHALE<tab>When I analyzed the sign that Calyx appeared on, I was able to determine the source of transmission. I traced it back to a terminal used only by Preservation, located in the foundation sector.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001530_GULOOLJA<tab>Foundation sector... That came up in my mother's records, didn't it? It's where the old castle was hidden.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001540_SHALE<tab>Everkeep was built atop the castle of the former kingdom. Access to the immediate area─the foundation sector─is highly restricted, with map data accordingly classified.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001550_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>The old castle is inside this tower...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001560_SHALE<tab>It's an ideal place for Preservation to conceal a terminal, I must say. Having existed since the Storm Surge, they would be familiar with the castle's layout.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001570_KRILE<tab>But I wonder, would someone so versed in electrope such as Calyx be so careless as to leave a trail?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001580_SHALE<tab>Oh, I expect he intended for us to find the terminal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001590_GRAHATIA<tab>It may be a trap, but it's our only lead. What do you think, my friend?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>If we have a lead, I say we follow it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We can't leave them to their own devices.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I think a little revenge is in order.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001600_GRAHATIA<tab>Agreed. And besides, you owe him for that bolt of lightning.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001610_GRAHATIA<tab>No, we cannot. We must learn exactly what he is plotting.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001620_GRAHATIA<tab>That it is. While I'm glad you're safe, we cannot allow his offense to go unanswered.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001630_SHALE<tab>If you're set on this course of action, I'll work on getting you access to the foundation sector. Sit tight for now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001640_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Please let me come with you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001650_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I may not possess any special skills, but I know the castle better than any. So please...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001660_WUKLAMAT<tab>Alright.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001670_WUKLAMAT<tab>If that's what you want, then we go together. The rest of us will take point and secure the way, and we'll count on you to guide us in the castle.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001680_CALYX<tab>We still lack sufficient data. Very well. Let us see how you perform against this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001690_CALYX<tab>That will do. We have enough to proceed with an analysis.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001700_KRILE<tab>Calyx was measuring our strength. Is that why he contrived to lead us here?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001710_WUKLAMAT<tab>It looks like we've cleared away the machines and beasts, but who knows what else he might have in store...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001720_WUKLAMAT<tab>From here on out, Sphene and Shale will move with us. Let's find that terminal, but stay alert for more threats.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001730_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Before my illness left me bedridden, I used to walk through here on my way to watch Otis and Zelenia train.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001740_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>You knew Otis, if I am not mistaken? Zelenia was his second-in-command in the royal knights of Alexandria.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001750_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Oh, how I loved to see the two of them spar. I once dreamed of fighting by their side, so I studied the magical arts under my tutor.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001760_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>But when I was fifteen, the Storm Surge broke out, and both my father and mother passed away.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001770_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>As the new queen, I was forbidden from taking to the battlefield, for our nation would fracture had I died without a successor.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001780_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Though in the end I could barely move, I regret that I didn't go out there and fight. At least while I still could.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001790_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>My Endless self lamented not being able to protect the realm with benevolence. 'Tis a feeling to which I can relate...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001800_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sphene...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001810_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Ah, forgive me! 'Twas not my intent to darken the mood. Come, let us press on.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001820_WUKLAMAT<tab>This is one big castle, though... How far does this hallway go?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001830_WUKLAMAT<tab>Do you know, Sphene?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001840_WUKLAMAT<tab>What...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001850_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>What...what happened!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001870_NEWSPHENE<tab>Oh? It seems our guest brought company.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001880_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>So this was your doing.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001890_NEWSPHENE<tab>It was. We installed a teleporter that is triggered by the presence of the key, you see.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001900_NEWSPHENE<tab>Ah, I'm afraid aetheric transmissions cannot penetrate the walls of the throne room. It will take your friends a good while to find you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001910_CALYX<tab>I confess, the Valia Pira did not suffice to assess your capabilities.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001920_CALYX<tab>So I shall try something else.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001930_CALYX<tab>You are free to use anything at your disposal. The better you fight, the more accurate my data.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001940_CALYX<tab>Attaining a precise measure of your strength─that is the most expeditious way...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001950_CALYX<tab>...To reclaim the key to which you so stubbornly cling.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001960_NEWSPHENE<tab>Ah, noble Zelenia, dashing as ever. These villains mean to do us harm. Strike them down, I bid you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001970_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>What? This machine is Zelenia!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001980_NEWSPHENE<tab>Indeed it is. We couldn't preserve her memories while she lived, so she has been reconstructed from our recollections of her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_001990_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>[SUPRESSING ANGER]ALT: [SUPPRESSING ANGER, GRUNTING THROUGH GRITTED TEETH]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002000_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>The Endless me being created in answer to the earnest desires of Alexandrians... That, I can accept.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002010_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>But to twist the memories of those I held dear and treat them as playthings...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002020_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>...This disgrace I cannot abide!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002030_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Loath though I am to comply with their demands, this monstrosity must be destroyed. Not least of all for Zelenia's honor.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002040_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>If she was indeed created from my memories, even if I cannot fight, I may be able to offer you counsel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002050_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>So please, lend me your strength and end this farce!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002060_CALYX<tab>Ah, there it is...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002070_ZELENIA<tab>I am Zelenia Triantafylli.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002080_ZELENIA<tab>Royal knight of Alexandria, and sworn blade of Her Majesty the Queen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002090_ZELENIA<tab>A disgraceful display... Forgive me, my queen... I have failed you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002100_NEWSPHENE<tab>Did you get what you needed?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002110_CALYX<tab>I did. Though these figures will complicate matters.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002120_NEWSPHENE<tab>Is that so? Well, if we are done here, then I shall end the transmission.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002130_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Hold it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002140_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>If you have no scruples about thus defiling the memories of Zelenia...then there is no way we will ever see eye to eye.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002150_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>You are not fit to be entrusted with the cherished memories of Alexandrians!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002160_CALYX<tab>I, for one, have no wish to employ the fruits of my research in this manner. It is a waste of time and effort.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002170_CALYX<tab>But since I relinquished my flesh long ago, I must resort to every conceivable method, so long as the hero insists on keeping the key.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002180_CALYX<tab>Why do you so oppose our objective?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002190_CALYX<tab>With the key, we would be able to harvest aether from other reflections and bring forth more Endless.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002200_CALYX<tab>We could give this chance to evolve not only to the people of the Ninth, but to those of the Source as well. I see no reason why you should reject such a boon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>We won't let you lay a finger on the reflections!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're aware of the connection between the worlds?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002210_NEWSPHENE<tab>How miserly you are! But unless you're willing to compromise, you won't be able to save anyone or anything.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002220_NEWSPHENE<tab>Oh, don't tell me you thought you were the only ones who knew? That is the height of hubris!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002230_NEWSPHENE<tab>Well, I'd say our conversation has run its course.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002240_NEWSPHENE<tab>Ultimately, what you think is immaterial, for the seeds we've sown have already quickened.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002250_NEWSPHENE<tab>The people have glimpsed hope in transcending death, and they can ill turn away from it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002260_NEWSPHENE<tab>And thus does my role come to an end. The rest, I leave in your capable hands, Calyx.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002270_CALYX<tab>As a token of gratitude for consenting to my tests, I leave you with a gift. Be sure to take it with you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002280_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Zelenia... It pains me to think that you're gone too...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002290_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ah hah! We've found you at last!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002300_GRAHATIA<tab>You had us quite worried when you suddenly disappeared. What in the world happened?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002310_KRILE<tab>Then Preservation's objective is indeed what Calyx claimed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002320_KRILE<tab>But for them to know about the Source and the shards, and to refer to theirs as the Ninth... That raises some questions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002330_WUKLAMAT<tab>Indeed. But for now, I'm just glad the two of you are safe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002340_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh, right. While we were scouring the castle for you, we came upon a room that looked like a library.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002350_KRILE<tab>By learning about the Alexandria of old, we may gain valuable insights into Preservation. Might we take a number of books with us?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002360_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>So books still remain... Of course, you are welcome to any that may be of use.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002370_SHALE<tab>If you don't mind, could we take a look around here first? I'm especially curious about the area over by the throne.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002380_WUKLAMAT<tab>This tiara... It was hers─the Endless Sphene's... What's it doing here?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002390_SHALE<tab>It's a type of regulator, I believe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002395_SHALE<tab>It contains the data of the Endless Sphene's memories. Calyx likely used it to create the simulant.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002400_SHALE<tab>Which means that, as long as the tiara is in our keeping, we shouldn't need to deal with any more simulants.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002410_SHALE<tab>Strange that he would abandon it, though. Perhaps because the simulant already played her role, like she said. Or Calyx made a copy of the memories...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002420_SHALE<tab>In any case, not much information of import appears to remain on this terminal, but I'll make it so we can access it remotely from the Backroom.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002430_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>This contains the memories of another me... The tale of her journey as Queen of Alexandria...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002440_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Might I hold on to this tiara? You may examine it whenever you wish, of course.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002450_WUKLAMAT<tab>It would be for the best, I think.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002460_WUKLAMAT<tab>Does that work for you, Shale?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002470_SHALE<tab>No objections from me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002480_SHALE<tab>Alright, I'm finished. Let's head to the library and then back outside.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002490_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Farewell, Zelenia.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002500_ISADORA<tab>I once hoped that Milos, at least, might be made an Endless. Then he wouldn't need to suffer anymore.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002510_WUKLAMAT<tab>You feel different now?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002520_ISADORA<tab>Thanks to Alisaie, Milos is on the road to recovery. He can grow up and live a normal life.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002530_ISADORA<tab>And I want to be there with him every step of the way. To grow old with him, as his mother...and not something else.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002540_ALISAIE<tab>That should do it. You're doing well, I'm glad to say.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002550_MILOS<tab>Thank you...Alisaie.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002560_ALISAIE<tab>You're welcome, Milos. Now, you'll feel breathless for a little while still, but don't fret. It'll get easier to speak with time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002570_ALISAIE<tab>That said, we can't rule out the possibility of a relapse. As a precaution, I would keep him away from lightning-infused objects.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002580_ISADORA<tab>Lightning... Does that include regulators?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002590_ALISAIE<tab>It does. I understand if it's difficult for you to part with something that you've worn for so long, though, so it's entirely up to you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002600_ISADORA<tab>No. For Milos's sake, I will do it. And if the environment here isn't good for him, I must consider moving outside the dome.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002610_WUKLAMAT<tab>You two would be more than welcome in Tuliyollal!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002620_ISADORA<tab>It's very assuring to hear that. If you don't mind, could you tell me about the process?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002630_MILOS<tab>I'm happy...I can talk again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002640_MILOS<tab>Before, I couldn't even thank my mother for caring for me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002650_MILOS<tab>But now we can talk lots... I can tell her that I'm happy... That I like it when she strokes my hair...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002660_ALISAIE<tab>Your mother is happy to talk to you as well, I'm sure.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002670_MILOS<tab>Queen Sphene always cheered me up... Always said that she would cure me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002680_MILOS<tab>Today, I'll practice walking with Mother... And next time, I'll go and visit you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002690_ISADORA<tab>Thank you for explaining everything.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002700_WUKLAMAT<tab>We'll come again to check on you, so if you have any other questions, just let me know!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002710_WUKLAMAT<tab>Right, let's get going, shall we?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002720_MILOS<tab>Please come back soon... You too, miss...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002730_WUKLAMAT<tab>It's good to see Milos doing so well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002740_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>The Endless me gave him the strength to hang on, and she didn't rely on any special power to do so...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002750_WUKLAMAT<tab>[FONDLY AGREEING “Hm”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002760_WUKLAMAT<tab>She wanted her people to be happy. Even though we had to fight, her love for them was very real, and it reached Milos.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002770_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I wish to be there to watch him grow as well. To make my way beside the people of Alexandria.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002780_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>In the name of his evolution, Calyx has wrought much unease and misery, and I cannot condone his path.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002790_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>No, I shall forge ahead on a path of my own─one that honors the memory of my other self!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002830_ANNOUNCER<tab>(-Announcer-)Citizens of Alexandria, please be advised. The distribution of neo regulators has concluded.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002840_ANNOUNCER<tab>(-Announcer-)We ask that all recipients equip their regulators and promptly complete device registration.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002850_ANNOUNCER<tab>(-Announcer-)The evolution of our kind is at hand. Together we shall rise above death, and bask in the infinite possibilities of eternal life!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002860_ALISAIE<tab>What is this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002870_ANXIETY05306<tab>Evolution? What evolution?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002880_BEWILDERMENT05306<tab>Those with neo regulators will become Endless, apparently...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002890_IRRITATION05306<tab>You mean there's no more!? Well, don't you feel lucky!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002900_TREPIDATION05306<tab>D-Don't look at me like that! Queen Sphene said there were only so many...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002910_CALMNESS05306<tab>I haven't registered mine yet. The more I thought about it, the more unsure I felt about becoming an Endless.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002920_TIMID05306<tab>Well, I registered right away. Anything to stop those terrible nightmares of being killed by mechanical soldiers.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002930_NEWSPHENE<tab>(-Simulant-)Ultimately, what you think is immaterial, for the seeds we've sown have already quickened.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002940_NEWSPHENE<tab>(-Simulant-)The people have glimpsed hope in transcending death, and they can ill turn away from it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002950_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>I see... The terror of their first encounter with death still lingers in their hearts.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002960_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Having previously been spared even the idea of it, they know not how to handle the emotions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002970_WUKLAMAT<tab>The funeral was meant to give everyone the chance to come to terms with loss. To grieve and move forward together...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002980_WUKLAMAT<tab>But everyone who was wearing a regulator had their memories of that moment erased.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002990_WUKLAMAT<tab>And to see those oblivious, happy souls, those who remembered must've wondered if it might not be better to be like them. To go back to a time when death didn't exist.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003000_ALISAIE<tab>And now they've been presented with the chance to do just that, by becoming an Endless. It's not hard to see why they would consider it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003010_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>If this fear of death continues to spread among the people, what will become of Alexandria...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003020_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>The gifts for our friends will have to wait. We should return to the Backroom at once.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002800_TREPIDATION05306<tab>What is that?ALT: What was that?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002810_TIMID05306<tab>A broadcast?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_002820_BEWILDERMENT05306<tab>What's going on?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003030_SHALE<tab>Oh, you're safe! That broadcast had us worried. The entire populace is on edge.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003040_ALISAIE<tab>So Alphinaud and the others are still out there...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003050_NOSTALGIA<tab>We have a situation on our hands!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003060_NOSTALGIA<tab>A civilian has been killed by a mechanical soldier here on True Vue!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003070_NOSTALGIA<tab>Wayakkwe is on the scene, and reports that the problem unit has been subdued by another sentry.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003080_GULOOLJA<tab>That doesn't make sense... Only someone with the King of Resolve's authority could order a soldier to do that!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003090_SHALE<tab>Not good. I tried to check the status of the authority, but was blocked from the core system.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003100_SHALE<tab>Given recent developments, I'd wager that Calyx is responsible for this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003110_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Perhaps we should go and see for ourselves.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003120_ERENVILLE<tab>(-Erenville-)It's me. There's been an incident in the outskirts...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003130_ERENVILLE<tab>(-Erenville-)A mechanical soldier attacked a local resident for no apparent reason.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003140_ERENVILLE<tab>(-Erenville-)Fortunately, several nearby hunters dealt with the rogue machine, so everyone is safe. But if other soldiers were to─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003150_ERENVILLE<tab>(-Erenville-)...Wait. Is that...? Oh gods...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003160_ERENVILLE<tab>(-Erenville-)More hostile sentries are bound for the settlement. I'll try to lure them away and then lose them somehow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003170_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Ill tidings, I take it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003180_WUKLAMAT<tab>In the outskirts, too!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003190_SHALE<tab>You'll go and help Erenville, won't you? We couldn't forgive ourselves if he came to harm. I'll have Geode join you from Earthen Sky.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003200_GULOOLJA<tab>I'm coming, too! I can't stay here while my people are in danger!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003210_WUKLAMAT<tab>Let's go!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003220_ERENVILLE<tab>Right, we're none the worse for the wear, but let's see what the situation is here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003230_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Geode and his people came and joined us while we were searching for you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003240_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>After which we happened to encounter Malachite. His usher duties brought him here, and he has quite the story to tell.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003250_MALACHITE<tab>It's a bit puzzling, to say the least. Even so, I'll try my best to explain.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003260_MALACHITE<tab>I was called to attend to the unfortunate soul slain by the mechanical soldier.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003270_MALACHITE<tab>Yet when I arrived, I found no body. Only a pile of dust, which the wind quickly scattered.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003280_MALACHITE<tab>Confused, I questioned the residents, but none knew what had become of it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003290_ALISAIE<tab>How odd... Did they remember the victim, at least?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003300_MALACHITE<tab>They did. Their memories of the deceased weren't sent to the cloud, I don't believe. Yet no body remained...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003310_WUKLAMAT<tab>If someone took it, surely they would've been noticed...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003320_MALACHITE<tab>With your permission, I shall return to the government sector for now. Please take care.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003330_GULOOLJA<tab>This is terrible... Why would they make the soldiers do this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003340_GEODE<tab>If Preservation is behind the attacks, I fear this won't be the end of it.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003350_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>All the neo regulators have been distributed, and potentially five thousand Endless are about to be born. What does Calyx hope to achieve with these killings?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003360_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>Does he seek to frighten people into registering them? Or perhaps...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003370_GRAHATIA<tab>(-G'raha Tia-)Oh, thank the Twelve you answered! Shale told me what happened. Is everything all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003380_GRAHATIA<tab>(-G'raha Tia-)...I see. 'Tis a relief to hear that Erenville is safe. Alas, I do not have good news to share in return...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003390_GRAHATIA<tab>(-G'raha Tia-)A driver lost control of his vehicle when its interface became unresponsive, and it crashed into the Nexus Arcade, injuring several people.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003400_GRAHATIA<tab>(-G'raha Tia-)Krile and I are helping to render aid, but with the sentries behaving strangely, we can't afford to lower our guard. Remain vigilant, my friend.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003410_GEODE<tab>I just received word from the Backroom. A hover cargo on True Vue threw off its driver, and it's rampaging through the area as we speak.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003420_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud had a similarly troubling report for me. Apparently, a riderless machine in the government sector came to life near a crowd clamoring for neo regulators.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003430_ALISAIE<tab>It proceeded to mow down several citizens, causing serious injuries.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003440_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>This is a tragedy... We must go and help the people!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003450_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sphene, wait! I'm coming with you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003460_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud is with Y'shtola, and he said they'll be all right. I'll go and see if other incidents have occurred elsewhere.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003470_ALISAIE<tab>From here, I'll head towards the quarry by way of the driftdowns.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003480_GEODE<tab>Certainly a lot of hover cargos coming and going in those parts. I'll join you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003490_ERENVILLE<tab>I shall remain here and speak further with the locals. I have company now, so you needn't worry about me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003500_GULOOLJA<tab>Then let's return to Solution Nine! If we hurry, we can catch up to Lamaty'i and Sphene.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003510_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sphene's gone on ahead! I leave her with you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003530_SOLUTIONNFIGHTER<tab>[ATTACK EXERT]ALT: [PUNCHING EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003540_SOLUTIONNFIGHTER<tab>Bloody things have gone mad!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003550_NOSTALGIA<tab>Why is this happening...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>[UNLEASHING MAGIC EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003580_YSHTOLA<tab>Surely there's a finite number of these things...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003590_GOSSAN<tab>Everyone, please try to remain calm and make your way to Resolution!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003600_TURMOIL05306<tab>This is just like before...when Zoraal Ja unleashed the soldiers on us!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003610_TURMOIL05306<tab>I don't have any souls left! I don't want to die! I don't want to die!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003630_KRILE<tab>No you don't!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003640_KRILE<tab>Are you al─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003645_KRILE<tab>[SHOCK REAX]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003650_CONFUSION05306<tab>No, no─why did you do that? Why!? You can't just...just leave me alone like this...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003660_CONFUSION05306<tab>If we had been Endless, then you'd still be here...you'd still be with me... But now...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003670_CONFUSION05306<tab>[ANGUISHED WAILING]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003680_GULOOLJA<tab>Are you alright!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003690_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>So many hurt... So many dead...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003700_ORIGINALSPHENE<tab>This is wrong! This is all wrong!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003810_CALYX<tab>By illness weakened, by wounds unmade, by age decayed...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003820_CALYX<tab>Such fragile flesh is worthless to us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003825_CALYX<tab>How mankind should evolve─<var 1A 02 /var>shall<var 1A 01 /var> evolve─I have already arrived at the answer.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07200_003830_CALYX<tab>The time is come to pose a new question.
